title: Overflow Servers
summary: Overflow Servers are servers used to hold players when a system server is full. The amount of players that are needed in non-core systems for an overflow server to be created is 200. Anomalies, drone squads/fleets, and other events will not spawn in overflow servers. These servers are rarely encountered because it is difficult to have 200 players in a single system without organization, and even then, the server would likely crash due to the number of players.
full_text:
Overflow Servers
Overflow Servers are servers used to hold players when a system server is full. The amount of players that are needed in non-core systems for an overflow server to be created is 200. Anomalies, drone squads/fleets, and other events will not spawn in overflow servers. These servers are rarely encountered because it is difficult to have 200 players in a single system without organization, and even then, the server would likely crash due to the number of players.

These servers are rarely encountered because it is difficult to have 200 players in a single system without organization, and even then, the server would likely crash due to the number of players.
